## CostMetric.cost() method

The cost contribution of this cost metric. Equal to [CostMetric.pricing](./faastjs.costmetric.pricing.md) \* [CostMetric.measured](./faastjs.costmetric.measured.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cost(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number
